# polytomic_mssql_connection (Data Source)

Microsoft SQL Server Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_mssql_connection" "mssql" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
